metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13065 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 has a NULL pointer dereference vulnerability in the function SVGStartElement in coders/svg.c. It was discovered that GraphicsMagick incorrectly handled certain image files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
